titles.title: To authorize a project to demonstrate the feasibility of voting by telephone.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1152)
Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Elections.

bill.summary: 5/5/1993--Introduced. Directs the Federal Election Commission to make a grant to a specified consortium for a project to demonstrate the feasibility of telephone voting. Authorizes appropriations.
